org.bouncycastle.crypto.digests

Class NonMemoableDigest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bouncycastle.crypto.digests.NonMemoableDigest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Digest, ExtendedDigest

    public class NonMemoableDigest
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExtendedDigest
    Wrapper removes exposure to the Memoable interface on an ExtendedDigest implementation.

          int outOff)
        Description copied from interface: Digest

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
